ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Hard 'Drive' To Find: As Snake-Eyes, Storm Shadow, and the Russian Arashikage ninja leader square off vs. a robot inside one of the Blue Ninjas' tech facilities, hoping to gain info on where the Blue Ninjas are, Cobra begins their quest of vengeance as they appear after the battle's won by our heroes after gaining info on the tech facility. Meanwhile, the Baroness leaves Castle Destro, obviously in pursuit as well of the same ninjas that killed Billy, and at the PIT III, Scarlett is alerted to this by the other Joes there.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:57:31. [CVDB313837] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:41:43. [Issue ID 911619]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrew Crossley,Gary Erskine,James Brown (J. Brown),Larry Hama,Ron Wagner,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Leatherneck,robot],Vipers,Blue Ninjas [security/surveillance guards,Scarlett,Clutch,Sensei Moskavina,Iron Grenadiers [Destro (leader),Dusty],Spirit,G.I. Joe [Snake-Eyes,Storm Shadow,Mainframe,Cobra [Cobra Commander,Iron Grenadier troopers],Stalker,Tele-Viper],Baroness
